name: Muesli deluxe
long_description:
INGREDIENTS: oats*, sultanas* (with sunflower oil*), malted wheat flakes* (wheat, barley malt extract), barley flakes*, wheat flakes*, sunflower seeds*, chopped apricots (with rice flour*), chopped dates* (with rice flour*), hazelnuts*, desiccated coconut* almonds*, cardamom*. * denotes organically grown ingredients.
Typical composition per 100g
....energy kJ..................... 1553 kJ
....energy kCal................. 371 kCal
....protein.......................... 11.00g
....carbohydrates............ 64.00g
........of which sugars..... 15.30g
....fat................................... 7.30g
........of which saturates. 1.50g
....fibre............................... 10.00g
....sodium.......................... 0.012g
....salt................................. 0.03g

name: Bran flakes
long_description:
INGREDIENTS:
Wholewheat flour (90%), Wheat bran (5%),Maize Glucose, Barley Malt, Sea salt

name: Chickpeas
short_description:
1 cup of chickpeas equals 200 g.
There are a  few ways to work with dried chickpeas. But once you ve tried them - you ll never go back to tinned!
 Long soak and simmer, about 10 hours or overnight plus 2 hours
 Quick soak and simmer, about 3 hours
 In the Slow Cooker, 4 hours on high heat or 8 hours on low heat. Do a big batch and freeze as below.
Dried chickpeas will triple in size when cooked. So 1 cup of dried chickpeas will make about 3 cups of cooked chickpeas.
Once cooked cool completely and freeze in batches - remember to label and date - keeps for 3 months.
long_description:
For inspiration :
Chickpea croutons (http://bambooturtle.co.uk/chickpea-croutons)
Sweet potato & chickpea curry (http://bambooturtle.co.uk/sweet-potato-curry)
Typical composition per 100g

....energy kCal................. 332 kCal

....fat................................... 5.40g
........of which saturates. 0.50g
....fibre............................... 10.70g
....sodium.......................... 0.036g
....salt................................. 0.09g

name: Ecoffee cup small
short_description:
Very few people know it, but 2017 marks a somewhat dubious 30th anniversary: that of the modern single-use “paper” cup. In three short decades, we estimate over 2 trillion of them have ended up in landfill – oh, in case you’re wondering, that’s 2,000,000,000,000.
The average lifespan of a single-use cup is 13 minutes – and due to their plastic content less than 1% get recycled.
So, in what could only be described as the understatement of the century, we felt there was an appetite for change! We passionately maintain that recycling is not the answer; instead, we can only institute real change with your help. In this enlightened era, there really is no excuse for single-use. That’s why we created Ecoffee Cup.
long_description:
Ecoffee Cup is a new generation of reusable takeaway cup. Created with the world’s fastest growing, most sustainable crop – bamboo fibre, Ecoffee Cup is BPA and phthalate free. If you haven’t experienced Ecoffee Cup, it feels a bit like thick, yet super-light cardboard; hard to believe it can hold hot liquids.
And because bamboo fibre is naturally sterile, Ecoffee Cup is lovely to drink from and won’t flavour-taint your drinks. The lid and sleeve are made with matte food-grade silicone which is designed especially for hot liquids.
It has a re-sealable no-drip lid, making it perfect to take with you everywhere you go. The whole product (cup, lid and sleeve) is dishwasher safe and should last for years if you treat it nicely; of course it can break if you treat it roughly and it is not suitable for microwave use.
Available in a wide range of fun, contemporary patterns; bright, vibrant colours or classic prints – there’s one to suit your style, wardrobe or mood. That’s why we think Ecoffee Cup packs just a little bit more style than its plastic, ceramic or stainless steel cousins.
Ecoffee Cup. Have Fun. Do Good.

name: Bamboo straw
long_description:
Plastic straws are one of the most vile creatures in the single use plastic family! Seemingly harmless and small these are actually an example of colossal waste generated for the most inconsequential convenience as we urbanites have come to expect plastic straws in almost all drinks. We ve all seen the pic of the turtle with a straw stuck up it s nose - but there is now an altenative.
dishwasher safe
sustainable
reusable
fun
to clean - use pipe cleaner or straw brush
wash in warm soapy water
easy to carry around with you
They are priced at £2 per straw or £8 for 5.

name: Sponge cloths
long_description:
Sodasan Eco Sponge Cloths is a long lasting, highly absorbent eco-friendly cleaning cloth with natural fibres which can be used anywhere around the house. The sponge cloths do not contain any fungicide and can be machine washed. Due to the natural fibres of the cloths they are easily compostable. They are composed of a cellulose - cottonwool mix and can be used around the entire house.
Benefits:
Yes Can be used for any household chore
Yes Compostable
Yes No fungicide
Yes Lint free
Yes Certified Vegan

name: Pot brush
long_description:
Fabulous little Pot Brush made ​​with FSC beech wood handle and natural plant fibers.
Perfect for use as a pot scourer for crusted on food. Handy Hint : even easier if you have burnt the bottom of the pot - sprinkle with a layer of bicarb - wet and leave to soak for a couple of hours. Job done.
Maintenance: Every 6 months apply a thin layer of linseed oil to the handle and leave to dry.
Has been FSC certified: which ensures that the management of the forest where trees used to produce this product has followed a series of principles and based on environmental, social and economic criteria are respected forest.
This is another Redecker product so quality guaranteed.

name: Dish brush
long_description:
Wooden Hard Dish Brush with untreated beech wood handle & fibre. Head is 8cm diameter and can be composted when tired. Replacement heads available. Handle 18 cm long. Handy hook to facillitate hanging when not in use. Made in Germany by Redecker.
Redecker brushes are the product of 75 years of experience in making hand crafted brushes that are not only functional but beautifully designed. Redecker themselves say "75 years have made us neither inflexible nor bored. We remain creative, curious and dedicated to our task with passion and enjoyment."

name: Safix scouring pads
short_description:
A natural reusable scouring pad made from coconut fiber.
Plastic free and Biodegradable/Compostable at the end of it's life.
Does not release microplasics into our environment, unlike commercial scouring pads

name: Canvas shopper
short_description:
Cotton Shopper Tote
As well as a good quality heavier than normal weight of material with each bag weighing an average of 65gms internal seams are overlocked and the handle fixings double stitched for long trouble free life.
Material: 100% Unbleached 5 oz Cotton Calico
Size: 38cm W x 42cmD x 62cm handles
Colour: Natural
The bag has fully finished seams and strong handles. A stylish and useful bag with superb ECO integrity.

name: String shopper
short_description:
Recycled Cotton String Bags
are available with long or short handles.
Made from recycled cotton and so are a completely eco friendly and stylish alternative to plastic bags.
So useable and convenient that it is little wonder that more and more people carry them.
They scrunch up to nothing but carry up to 40lbs and are very hard wearing.
Sourced from S. India where the workers are part of a Rural Womens workforce and the ETI Base code is in place to ensure fair conditions for those workers.
So eco-friendly. So fairly traded. So useful.

short_description:

name: Bamboo ear buds
short_description:
These cotton swabs are made from bamboo and soft cotton, thus 100% biodegradable.
Both at home and while travelling, you can now choose these cotton buds as a sustainable alternative. After usage, you can dispose of the cotton swabs by simply throwing them into your organic waste or compost.
They are packaged in a box made of recycled cardboard. 200 cotton swabs per box.
Of course, all of our products are water-neutral, vegan & fair.

name: Elephant box large square
long_description:
Going zero waste? This canister is perfect for shopping at your local bulk store. Airtight and leakproof, it's also great for keeping things fresh in the cupboard or for taking your morning smoothie to work. All our products can be used to store food in the freezer and this canister is perfect for storing stocks or soups. Use a marker pen to keep track of whats inside.
Made from 100% food grade stainless steel. Contains a silicone seal which removes easily for washing.

name: Toothpaste
short_description:
50 g
Natural Toothpaste with pure white clay, and extracts of myrrh and liquorice (no problem if you dislike liquorice, the flavour is not detectable due to the essential oils) which are proven to inhibit plaque causing bacteria. Available in peppermint.
At Green Wyse we know that it is unecessary to use toothpastes with bright colours or high foaming action. These make no difference to the cleaning ability. Our natural toothpastes have chalk to polish away stains, kaolin to act as a gum astringent, toning and tightening, herbal extracts of myrrh and liquorice to inhibit plaque forming bacteria and promote hard enamel
long_description:
No animal ingredients or testing
Purchasing of supplies from like minded companies
Packaging kept to a minimum with the use of re-useable, compostable, eco-friendly and sustainable consumables wherever possible
No parabens
No SLS
No synthetic colours – natural clays provide any colours used
No chemical fragrances – essential oils are used instead
Products created using solar electric (weather permitting!) and at least 80% renewable electric otherwise.
No palm oil
Organic plant extracts and ingredients used whenever possible
Cottage industry production means low outgoings and overheads, with the cost savings passed to the consumers.

name: Beeswax wraps
short_description:
Please note the patterns all vary - so not exactly as seen in pictutres.
Eco friendly alternative to cling film and tin foil. Breathable and anti bacterial helping to keep your food fresh. Flexible and slightly adhesive. Can be shaped around bowls and folded to wrap sandwiches, bread, cheese, fruit and vegetables.
Handmade in Bedfordshire using 100 % cotton fabric, local wax,organicjojoba oiland natural pine resin.
Caring for your wrap :
This is a natural product and will soften over time.Refresh by placing in the oven at 100 degrees c for 2 minutes. Can be used for up to a year, after which it can be added to your compost where it will fully biodegrade.
long_description:
Available in 4 sizes
Small
Medium
Large
Pouch

name: Cutlery set
short_description:
Bambaw's bamboo cutlery set is the sustainable, plastic-free solution to single-use cutlery when eating away from home, or for parties.
Our wooden cutlery is lightweight enough to be taken anywhere, but also durable to withstand continued use.
The bamboo cutlery set includes
A 20-cm bamboo fork
A 20-cm bamboo knife with a serrated blade
A 20-cm bamboo spoon
A 20-cm bamboo straw
A cleaning brush
A convenient jute pouch

name: Soap
long_description:
SLS FREE PARABEN FREE PALM OIL FREE PLASTIC FREE CRUELTY FREE
Conscientious Approach (https://www.friendlysoap.co.uk/#)
Friendly Soap put ethics before profits. From start to finish, no stone is left unturned in the quest to produce low-impact soap. Sustainability and ethical integrity are top of the list, bringing you fabulous natural soap that is skin friendly, animal friendly and earth friendly.
Powered by hands
Friendly soap is made using the ancient cold-process method which creates a biodegradable soap with zero by-products. Energy consumption is kept to an absolute minimum - each and every bar is poured and cut by hand and packed in recycled and recyclable card boxes, here in the UK.
Works a treat
A little goes a long way when using our array of natural Soaps and Shampoos. They all produce a rich, velvety lather that is gentle to skin, nourishes hair, and leaves you refreshed and ready to go. Guaranteed cruelty-free and vegan, and free from plastic, Parabens, SLS, Pthalates or Triclosan.

name: Konjac sponge
short_description:
The Konjac potato or Konnyaku is a perennial plant native to Asia and can be found growing wild at very high altitudes. A totally natural food source, Konjac is 97% water, rich in mineral goodness and low in calories. The plant is naturally alkaline, which leaves skin perfectly balanced.
Konnyaku has been used in Korea, Japan and China for over 1,500 years as medicine, food, a dieting aid and a beauty product. Due to the plant's claimed health giving properties, the Konjac Sponge was originally created for delicate baby skin.
We are proud to carry the Leaping Bunny and Vegan Society symbols as signs of our commitment to producing natural, cruelty free skin care. All our sponges are tested for authenticity and purity, However, many inferior products are often mass produced in poor quality, unethical factories and use low grade, unclean materials.
long_description:
Why we love them?
Benefits
100% natural vegetable fibre
Packed with minerals & antioxidants
Non-toxic
100% free from impurities & pollutants
Earth-friendly
100% Cruelty Free & Certified Vegan
Naturally sustainable
Environmentally safe
Kind to the environment & skin
100% colouring-free
100% additive-free
100% biodegradable
For more information please visit The Konjac Sponge (https://www.konjacspongecompany.com/) company

name: Beauty balm vegan
short_description:
The Balancing Frankincense, Lavender and Orange Beauty Balm is a luxurious treat - this can be used as an intensive moisturiser, as a cleanser or as a concentrating mask to be slathered on the skin for 15 mins and removed with a flannel.
Frankincense is thought to have anti-ageing properties and is a favourite in the beauty world for its youthful affect!
The healing properties of lavender are well documented - this is due to its anti oxidant and anti microbial benefits. This means it s perfect for hormonal break outs or when you need a skin pick me up after a late night.
The zesty orange essential oil complements the frankincense beautifully, making this the must have stunning treat for your skin.
The Luxury Beauty Balm with Rose geranium and Sweet Orange can be used in the same way as the Balancing Beauty Balm. It again smells amazingly fresh, with a slight rosey floral aroma.
Use it as an intensive moisturiser or for an rejuvenating facial mask. Cover the face with the balm and relax for 15 mins while the luxury balm goes to work. Maybe even read a book or even better meditate! Wipe off the redidual balm with a hot wet face cloth and enjoy.
Added to this oil cleansing is definitely all the rage at the moment in the natural beauty world. We ve just taken this a step further. The theory stems from the well known scientific fact that like attracts like. So when you use oil as a cleanser the sweet almond oil in the balm attracts and dissolves unwanted oils from the skin. But (and this is the important bit) it does not strip the skin of its natural defences through harsh chemicals and foaming agents. Wet your face with warm water - no soap. Aplly the balm gently with your fingertips and work in using small gentl circular movements and the wipe off with a hot wet face cloth. Leaving your skin feeling dewy and supple.....
Rose Geranium is believed to be great as a relaxing, hormone- balancing essential oil.
It has mood lifting properties and works really well to calm down irritated and inflamed skin. While the zesty Sweet Orange essential oil complements the Rose Geranium beautifully.
long_description:
As always The Herb Garden products are suitably simple but luxuriously divine.
They have included the Calendula infused oil specifically for its gentle healing and anti inflammatory properties.
Added to this they have incorporated Vit E oil which is a natural preservative - hence the long shelf life - as well as a powerful anti oxidant. Anti oxidants are known to assist in neutralising free radicals. Free radicals can be created by our bodies as we age, or by everyday factors like digestion or exercise. They’re also caused by exposure to external things like:
tobacco smoke
ozone
environmental pollutants
radiation - sunlight
Ingredeints :
Soy wax
sweet almond oil
Calendula infused oil
Vit E oil
Essential Oils

name: Dental floss
short_description:
Our natural dental charcoal floss is made with bamboo charcoal, beeswax and peppermint essential oil. This 30 metres floss clew is packed in a zero-waste and plastic free glass container; the metal dispensing lid easily allows you to cut the floss.
Our natural dental silk floss is made with candelilla wax and cardamon essential oil.
long_description:
• PETA cruelty-free & plastic-free packaging
• Made from wild & sustainably grown silk from the Chinese Silk District
• Comes in a reusable glass container & metal dispenser
• Packed in biodegradable and compostable kraft paper box

name: Razor bamboo
short_description:
Return to classic shaving with Bambaw’s stylish double edge safety bamboo razor.
With a sturdy bamboo handle, our unique bamboo safety razor is a great plastic-free alternative.
Unlike disposable plastic ‘pink or blue’ razors, the Bambaw razor provides a unisex design and a close shave for both men and women.
Fits all double edge razor blades and comes with an in-depth user manual included to provide the perfect shave.

name: Copper scourer
short_description:
Another fab product from Redecker
Non-plastic durable scrubbers are very hard to find. You may still be able to find some steel wool ones but they rust easily and are not extremely durable - and can be very abrasive, damaging cookware. We found this one that is 100% copper.
It is durable and machine-washable (up to 60 degrees Celsius), and 100% recyclable. It cleans pots, pans, ovens, ceramic cooktops, glass, stainless steel...thoroughly and gently. Because copper is a soft metal that is non-abrasive, its fine copper threads loosen even the most stubborn dirt carefully.
Not recommended for non-stick pans. Please note that these scrubbers may scratch surfaces they are used on, but not nearly as readily as would steel wool. Comes as a set of 2.
Dimensions:
Length x Width x Height: 7.6 x 7.6 x 3.8 cm / 3" x 3" x 1.5"
Weight: 0.02 kg / 0.04 lb

name: Mesh bag
short_description:
These certified organic mesh produce bags are ideal for your fruit, veg and herbs. They’re breathable which means you can leave your fruit and veg inside the bag.
They’re made responsibly, ethically and by farmers who respect nature and observe the guideline of the Global Organic Textile Standard.
Produce bags are designed to be used over and over again, unlike the flimsy single use plastic bags pushes at shoppers in supermarkets. These produce bags give you the consumer the power to make a difference and vote with your feet. Be part of the circular economy, not the linear with reusable produce bags.

name: Deo
long_description:
Natural Organic Deodorant Ingredients
The Earth Conscious Natural Deodorant is a totally natural deodorant made in the UK using natural organic ingredients.
They do not use synthetic fragrances thus our scents are very subtle. Their ingredients are sourced from ethical suppliers with the majority certified by the Soil Association (http://www.soilassociation.org).
Below you can find out more about the benefits of each ingredient they use and if you're interested in why they don't use others there is our The Whys and Why Nots of our Natural Deodorant Ingredients. (https://www.earthconscious.co.uk/blogs/the-earth-conscious-way)
Coconut Oil
A main ingredient in our natural deodorant. Coconut oil is not only incredibly soothing and softening to the skin it also has many health benefits. Coconut oil contains healthy fats that do wonders for the skin and body. It is also naturally antibacterial and anti-fungal so it’s really the perfect ingredient for a natural deodorant. Our coconut is high quality Soil Association certified organic.
Shea Butter
Incredibly luxurious softening butter. Like our coconut oil, the shea butter we use is quality Soil Association certified organic. Shea butter also contains fatty acids and nutrients that work wonders for our skin and health.
Jojoba Wax
Jojoba is the most similar to human skin oil which makes it a great oil balancing ingredient.
Sunflower Wax
Sunflower wax is rich in Vitamin E which helps to fight free radicals in the skin and prevent dry skin conditions.
Sodium Bicarbonate
An active ingredient in odour control. Both antibacterial and absorbent, it is powerful and simply the best at keeping odour at bay all day long. We use in as low levels as we can to provide maximum effectiveness as occasionally some find sodium bicarbonate to be a skin irritant.
Arrowroot Powder
An edible flour in a similar form to potato flour. It gives our deodorant a creamier texture that is easier to apply to the skin. You don’t get much safer than edible!
Natural Fragrance
Our natural deodorants are fragranced with essential oils ONLY. The whole oil is used which provides a light and pleasant fragrance, not too overpowering. The essential oils each have their own health benefits as well as keeping you fresh. For instance, lavender will have a calming effect. Citrus will be more uplifting.
All of these natural ingredients are packaged together to make a truly effective natural deodorant.

name: Special soap
short_description:
A natural handmade shaving soap, for a traditional wet shave.
Wave goodbye to harsh gels and foams, and say hello to a gently soothing and creamy lather.
long_description:
Shaving bars
Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium olivate, Aqua, Sodium castorate, Kaolin (clay), Lavandula angustifolia (lavender) essential oil contains linalool, limonene, geraniol, Citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) essential oil contains limonene, Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf juice

name: Face pads in glass jar
short_description:
Limited stock at the moment but more on the way. The pads are square, some come in a pouch or in a handy drawstring bag. Some of the pads have a patterned background while others are plain white. Hopefully, something for everyone’s taste.
Please note the colours and patterns shown in pic may not be what you are sent as pattern and styles do vary.
